rooms.description: A spacious entrance that welcomes guests and adheres to Vastu by ensuring a clean energy flow at the entry.
Open-plan living space with large windows for natural light and a view of the garden; designed in Brutalist style using raw concrete finishes.
Formal dining area integrated into the living space, with robust material usage to match the Brutalist aesthetic.
Fully equipped kitchen that aligns with local building norms and includes a dedicated workspace following Vastu principles for cooking area placement.
Comfortable guest room designed for privacy and ease of access; incorporates Brutalist design with exposed concrete structures.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a private ensuite bathroom and integrated storage solutions. Positioned to maximize natural light per Vastu recommendations.
Secondary master bedroom with ample space for personalization; includes adjoining storage areas and windows that ensure a direct view of the garden.
Dedicated home office designed in a quiet corner to minimize distractions while incorporating natural light. The design respects Vastu by situating the workspace in an area that avoids heavy traffic.
Space for laundry and storage; designed with durability and ease of access in mind.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ensure a connection with the outdoors, following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Sturdy reinforced door for security and durability in line with local building norms.
